SEARCH
Package danogl.collisions

Class PairCollisionData

java.lang.Object
danogl.collisions.PairCollisionData
public abstract class PairCollisionData extends Object
An abstract class that represents the computing and caching of data regarding the collision of two objects. Concrete subclasses will correspond to a certain combination of specific colliders.
Author:
Dan Nirel
